price: 9. Eh Nkolo wa biso! Yo okosangisa bato o mokolo mwa mbano moye mokozala na ntembe te; ya sôló Allah azangisaka elaka naye te.
arabic: رَبَّنَآ إِنَّكَ جَامِعُ ٱلنَّاسِ لِيَوۡمٖ لَّا رَيۡبَ فِيهِۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يُخۡلِفُ ٱلۡمِيعَادَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: rabbanā innaka jāmiʿu al-nāsi liyawmin lā rayba fīhi inna al-laha lā yukh'lifu al-mīʿāda
